report.title: A filterable list of records including every field of GLiTRS data.
report.description: Includes every occurrence for every sample for every source with location.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN samples s on s.id = o.sample_id LEFT JOIN survey_attribute_values yav1 ON yav1.survey_id = o.survey_id and yav1.survey_attribute_id = #source_data_type_id# and yav1.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt1 ON ctt1.id = yav1.int_value LEFT JOIN survey_attribute_values yav2 ON yav2.survey_id = o.survey_id and yav2.survey_attribute_id = #source_doi_website_id# and yav2.deleted=false LEFT JOIN survey_attribute_values yav3 ON yav3.survey_id = o.survey_id and yav3.survey_attribute_id = #source_publication_year_id# and yav3.deleted=false LEFT JOIN survey_attribute_values yav4 ON yav4.survey_id = o.survey_id and yav4.survey_attribute_id = #source_contact_id# and yav4.deleted=false LEFT JOIN survey_attribute_values yav5 ON yav5.survey_id = o.survey_id and yav5.survey_attribute_id = #source_contact_affiliation_id# and yav5.deleted=false LEFT JOIN survey_attribute_values yav6 ON yav6.survey_id = o.survey_id and yav6.survey_attribute_id = #source_contact_email_id# and yav6.deleted=false LEFT JOIN survey_attribute_values yav7 ON yav7.survey_id = o.survey_id and yav7.survey_attribute_id = #source_additional_contact_id# and yav7.deleted=false LEFT JOIN survey_attribute_values yav8 ON yav8.survey_id = o.survey_id and yav8.survey_attribute_id = #source_full_title_id# and yav8.deleted=false LEFT JOIN survey_attribute_values yav9 ON yav9.survey_id = o.survey_id and yav9.survey_attribute_id = #source_user_id# and yav9.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt2 ON ctt2.id = yav9.int_value LEFT JOIN survey_attribute_values yav10 ON yav10.survey_id = o.survey_id and yav10.survey_attribute_id = #source_data_paper_id# and yav10.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations l on l.id = o.location_id and l.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav1 ON lav1.location_id = o.location_id and lav1.location_attribute_id = #location_coordinate_method_id# and lav1.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt3 ON ctt3.id = lav1.int_value LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav2 ON lav2.location_id = o.location_id and lav2.location_attribute_id = #location_spatial_precision_id# and lav2.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt4 ON ctt4.id = lav2.int_value LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav3 ON lav3.location_id = o.location_id and lav3.location_attribute_id = #location_broad_location_id# and lav3.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt5 ON ctt5.id = lav3.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav1 ON sav1.sample_id = o.sample_id and sav1.sample_attribute_id = #sample_plot_id# and sav1.deleted=false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav2 ON sav2.sample_id = o.sample_id and sav2.sample_attribute_id = #sample_effort_reported_id# and sav2.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt6 ON ctt6.id = sav2.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav3 ON sav3.sample_id = o.sample_id and sav3.sample_attribute_id = #sample_effort_1_id# and sav3.deleted=false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav4 ON sav4.sample_id = o.sample_id and sav4.sample_attribute_id = #sample_realm_id# and sav4.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt7 ON ctt7.id = sav4.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav5 ON sav5.sample_id = o.sample_id and sav5.sample_attribute_id = #sample_data_purpose_id# and sav5.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt8 ON ctt8.id = sav5.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav6 ON sav6.sample_id = o.sample_id and sav6.sample_attribute_id = #sample_data_purpose_info_id# and sav6.deleted=false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav7 ON sav7.sample_id = o.sample_id and sav7.sample_attribute_id = #sample_treatment_id# and sav7.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt9 ON ctt9.id = sav7.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav8 ON sav8.sample_id = o.sample_id and sav8.sample_attribute_id = #sample_treatment_info_id# and sav8.deleted=false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav9 ON sav9.sample_id = o.sample_id and sav9.sample_attribute_id = #sample_technique_id# and sav9.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt10 ON ctt10.id = sav9.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav10 ON sav10.sample_id = o.sample_id and sav10.sample_attribute_id = #sample_effort_unit_1_id# and sav10.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt11 ON ctt11.id = sav10.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav11 ON sav11.sample_id = o.sample_id and sav11.sample_attribute_id = #sample_effort_unit_2_id# and sav11.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt12 ON ctt12.id = sav11.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav12 ON sav12.sample_id = o.sample_id and sav12.sample_attribute_id = #sample_effort_2_id# and sav12.deleted=false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav13 ON sav13.sample_id = o.sample_id and sav13.sample_attribute_id = #sample_completeness_id# and sav13.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt13 ON ctt13.id = sav13.int_value LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav1 ON oav1.occurrence_id = o.id and oav1.occurrence_attribute_id = #occurrence_sex_id# and oav1.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt14 ON ctt14.id = oav1.int_value LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav2 ON oav2.occurrence_id = o.id and oav2.occurrence_attribute_id = #occurrence_count_type_id# and oav2.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt15 ON ctt15.id = oav2.int_value LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav3 ON oav3.occurrence_id = o.id and oav3.occurrence_attribute_id = #occurrence_count_id# and oav3.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav4 ON oav4.occurrence_id = o.id and oav4.occurrence_attribute_id = #occurrence_taxon_certainty_id# and oav4.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt16 ON ctt16.id = oav4.int_value LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav5 ON oav5.occurrence_id = o.id and oav5.occurrence_attribute_id = #occurrence_lifestage_id# and oav5.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt17 ON ctt17.id = oav5.int_value LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav6 ON oav6.occurrence_id = o.id and oav6.occurrence_attribute_id = #occurrence_caste_id# and oav6.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt18 ON ctt18.id = oav6.int_value LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav7 ON oav7.occurrence_id = o.id and oav7.occurrence_attribute_id = #occurrence_sensitive_data_id# and oav7.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav8 ON oav8.occurrence_id = o.id and oav8.occurrence_attribute_id = #occurrence_taxon_name_in_source_id# and oav8.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav9 ON oav9.occurrence_id = o.id and oav9.occurrence_attribute_id = #occurrence_taxonomy_notes_id# and oav9.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations l2 ON l2.id = ANY (o.location_ids) LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt19 ON ctt19.id = l2.location_type_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist# and o.created_on >= '#input_date_from#' and (ctt19.id is null or ctt19.term = 'Countries 2016')
